Articles.Content: In the tech tree, medium fairings should be positioned earlier, ideally at the start of the second tech tree. Currently, they appear halfway through Tech Tree 2. This placement feels problematic because missions requiring medium fairings, such as launching large probes, yield substantial scientific data. However, players cannot utilize these fairings until they accumulate significantly more science. I propose adjusting the tech tree to introduce medium fairings earlier.

20 hours ago, Ryaja said:

In the tech tree, medium fairings should be positioned earlier, ideally at the start of the second tech tree. Currently, they appear halfway through Tech Tree 2. This placement feels problematic because missions requiring medium fairings, such as launching large probes, yield substantial scientific data. However, players cannot utilize these fairings until they accumulate significantly more science. I propose adjusting the tech tree to introduce medium fairings earlier.

I agree, all my rockets looks like they wear a corset. No issue with cargo bays beeing late but not fairings. 
They kind of define ship classes for me. 

Gilly class is small fairing, restricted to an medium hydrogen tank in middle and small around 1+8
Moho class is medium fairing so medium center and around 1+6.
Dress class is unique in that it adds the large nuclear engine and large tanks, so 1+8 in medium fairing. 
Jool class is large fairing and the large round tank.
